Lorelei Collection.name: Emiliana
Lorelei Collection.description: An adorable blend of pink and white, adorned with charming bows, delicate pearls, and touches of elegant gold in the design.

Lorelei Collection.name: Nerissa
Lorelei Collection.description: An enchanting blend of water lilies and delicate spider webs, creating a whimsical 3D masterpiece that captures the magic of nature.

Lorelei Collection.name: Ligeia
Lorelei Collection.description: A cute fusion of enchanting sirens and a touch of modern cuteness, adorned with charming bows for an irresistibly adorable charm.

Lorelei Collection.name: Aurora
Lorelei Collection.description: Dive into the enchanting world where the shimmering hues of the aurora borealis dance upon your nails, creating a captivating underwater masterpiece.

Lorelei Collection.name: Eloise
Lorelei Collection.description: Indulge in the adorable allure of a pink-themed superstar and bow nail set, perfect for unleashing your inner cuteness!

Lorelei Collection.name: Zarina
Lorelei Collection.description: Elevate your nail game with our adorable limited edition set featuring vibrant butterflies, blooming flowers, and sparkling jewels accented with charming silver details.

Aureliana Collection.name: Gellie
Aureliana Collection.description: Adorn your nails with the enchanting allure of a jellyfish-inspired design, featuring adorable pops of red and blue that will make your fingertips a whimsical ocean delight.

Aureliana Collection.name: Gisella
Aureliana Collection.description: Dazzle your nails with a whimsical blend of pink and blue hues, adorned with delightful water and floral textures for an irresistibly cute touch.

Aureliana Collection.name: Aysha
Aureliana Collection.description: Indulge in adorable nail art with our pink, yellow, and iridescent-themed set featuring whimsical water textures, sweet bows, and delicate flowers for a touch of cuteness at your fingertips.

Aureliana Collection.name: Serafina
Aureliana Collection.description: A whimsical world of black and white, adorned with twinkling stars and charming mushrooms, where chaos finds its delightful harmony.

Aureliana Collection.name: Venera
Aureliana Collection.description: A whimsical symphony of textures and colors, where flowers effortlessly dance in perfect harmony.

Aureliana Collection.name: Norina
Aureliana Collection.description: A delightful blend of spring perfection with charming floral details to infuse your style with seasonal sweetness.

Mariela Collection.name: Zaira
Mariela Collection.description: A beautiful blend of blue porcelain, adorable bows, and fruity charm creates a surprisingly cohesive and irresistibly cute collection.

Mariela Collection.name: Daviana
Mariela Collection.description: Indulge in the enchanting allure of our nail set, adorned with charming bows, delightful flowers, sweet hearts, and playful kisses for a touch of irresistible cuteness.

Mariela Collection.name: Mai
Mariela Collection.description: Embark on a heartwarming journey through a whimsical world where bunnies and stars collide in a charming romantic tale, inspired by the Seishun Buta Yar≈ç anime.

Mariela Collection.name: Liviana
Mariela Collection.description: A whimsically rebellious blue and silver coffin-shaped rock-star set adorned with charming hearts and intricate punk silver designs.

Mariela Collection.name: Mirella
Mariela Collection.description: Indulge in pure sweetness with this irresistibly cute collection, adorned with cherries, bows, hearts, and an array of charming details in a vibrant palette.

Mariela Collection.name: Noemi
Mariela Collection.description: A whimsical collection of dark-themed florals, blending textures for an irresistibly cute touch.
